utils

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Region
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class Region
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents an area in 2-D space
    Author:
    Vee

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • Region

        public Region(float x,
              float y,
              float width,
              float height)
        Creates a region object with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        x - The x component of this region
        y - The y component of this region
        width - width of the region
        height - height of the region

      • Region

        public Region(Vector2 location,
              Vector2 size,
              boolean centered)
        Creates a region object with two Vector2 objects
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the region
        size - the size of the region
        centered - If true, the region will treat the given Vector2 as it's center as oppose to it's top-left corner

        Parameters:

      • getCenter

        public Vector2 getCenter()
        Gets the center of this region

        A Vector2 object representing the point at the center of this region

      • containsPoint

        public boolean containsPoint(Vector2 v)
        Checks whether a location is located within this region
        Parameters:
        v - A Vector2 object representing the location to check
        Returns:
        true if the given vector is located within the bounds of this region, otherwise, false

      • containsPoint

        public boolean containsPoint(Point v)
        Checks whether a location is located within this region
        Parameters:
        v - A Point object representing the location to check
        Returns:
        true if the given point is located within the bounds of this region, otherwise, false
